answers.answer: My last DD was November 4th! Scorpio's are great but they are a handful! LOL! Congrats!
Congrats!!  My DD bday is 11/2 she will be 2.
That is great. How fun to pick your little ones B-day! My Dh's Bday is Nov 2nd!

My edd is November 1st.  Hubby says thats not good for him since its the middle of the week!  Hopefully I will be early though, I have a drs appt tomorrow and hopefully he will tell me how big he is because I think this baby is huge from looking at the 3D u/s.  Have you picked out a name yet?

First off congrats...My o-day was lateer this month than last.. by my fertilty chart im only 6days past ovulation. but we bd the wrong week. we did bd a day after ovulation which is a low chance. my AF is normally on the 10th of the month give or take a few days. but i feeling cramps already but its not normal af cramps its flutters every once in a while. im currently 6dpo any one have any ideas if its just af
Congrats,  that must be awesome to know exactly when you will see your baby for the first time :)
my little girl's name will be Antonia Marie (my dad's name is Anthony and i'm naming her after him)

question: just wanted to share my excitement with everyone.  i went to the dr. thursday and we picked nov. 3 (edd is nov. 10)as my little one's bday.  it's a friday, which is perfect for us, because now my mother in law can come down and stay with my little ones while i'm in the hospital so my dh can be with me.  he is such a huge help.  btw, it is a scheduled csection already, so i just go in at 6am and will have my baby girl by 10am.  i can't believe there's an end to all this and that my little girl will be in our arms in just a little over 8wks.  i can't wait to see her.  i had an u/s on friday (i have them monthly d/t gestational diabetes) and they estimated her wt at 4lbs 3oz already.  she had the chubbiest cheeks and the entire time of the u/s she kept playing with her toes, blinking her eyes, and sticking out her tongue.  i still can't believe she's mine.i hope you all have a wonderful day and good luck to all of those ttc.
title: bday picked/open forum
